title: >Must be level X to create discussion
body:
\>Is Lvl 11 with -454 points till i'm level 12

Rito pls.

Edit: I'm not joking

http://i.imgur.com/QYr5Ik1.png

replies.body: Try closing and reopening client. Probably just a crashed thread for some reason.

It can take a moment for your account to sync to the boards.  You look sync'd up now, so everything should be okay!

The experience in your profile should just be a display issue.  We ranked up how fast you get to level 30 by half, so you max faster!
